WebLink.url: {!URLFOR('/lightning/o/RecruitmentPlan__c/new?&defaultFieldValues=' +'ApproverBOD__c=' + User.ManagerId__c +',StartDate__c=' + Text(today()) +',Budget__c=' + "50000000" +',Year__c=' + Text(Year(Today())) +',Status__c=' + "Created" +',EndDate__c=' + Text(YEAR( Today())+ 1)+"-" + Text(MONTH( Today()))+"-"+Text(DAY( Today())) )}
